COMPRALO

YA

it is different. it gives me a tiny bit of vertigo, which is strange. the figuring out is repetitious, but it is interesting for a game. The puzzles get strange after a bit, but the levels seem never ending, and just more of the same, but yet different. you are guided by the fact that almost every thing they give in an area, has a solution, and that solution is that you have to find their one way of solving the puzzle area. there is only one way, and when you figure out their sequence, then it is one step after another till you get it done. The patterns of the puzzle get easier over time, the puzzles themselves get harder. I am not unhappy with it. after two or three areas now i give myself a break, as your emotions go bipolar with ups and downs while playing it. it is uniquely satisfying in a weird way.

A delight of a game to play, with challenging puzzles and witty dialogue alike. If this game was just a walking simulator but with the same dialogue I'd still recommend it, it makes up a very large part of the appeal of this game. Overall, I give Portal 2 a 7/7 pizza rolls.

A fantastic sequel to the original Portal. Much longer than the original, while maintaining the same fantastic story. 10/10 would recommend to anyone looking for a great campaign or couch co-op.

"All these Science Spheres are made of asbestos by the way, keeps out the rats. Let us know if you feel a shortness of breath, a persistent dry cough, or your heart stopping. Because that's not part of the test, that's asbestos. Good news is the lab boys say the symptoms of asbestos poisoning show a median latency of 44.6 years, so if you're thirty or older you're laughing. Worst case scenario you miss out on a few rounds of Canasta, plus you've forwarded the cause of science by three centuries. I punch those numbers into my calculator, it makes a happy face."

In all seriousness, my favorite game. played a ton on xbox, probably have a lot more hours i enjoyed it so much.
This game is amazing, the lore, story and gameplay are all amazing. It's the first game I've every played that I don't have a single complaint about.

This is an amazing game. It has a good story, good game play, a good soundtrack, and good atmosphere. You can also play with friends which extends the play time. Not only that but you can also create puzzles and play custom puzzles, which means you'll have infinite content from this game. It's worth the money. I would have paid $20 for this, Surprisingly, There are $20 games that are less fun than this game. If you want more content after playing through, there are mods for this game that are really fun.

This is just going to sum up my great xp with a friend of mine. We played the standard chambers, one by one. Had some struggles, but the bonding with your partner is immeasurable, because you both go through the same stuff. We're looking forward to play challenge mode next. Big yikes, given the last standard chamber took us almost six hours. Still, I recommend this game for wholesomeness it presents just by playing multiplayer.
